title: Game Scoop Episode 558
description: Daemon is joined by the hosts of Podcast Beyond, Podcast Unlocked, and Nintendo Voice Chat to discuss the highs and lows of PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo in 2019.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (Daemon Hatfield)
